Hey All

Apparently in astrological terms there is some kind of new turn, i=
.e. movement of planets atmoshperic change or something that is happening w=
hich start during the month of August...gets intense from the 15th onwards =
till the 9th of September.

I may be way off the point...and I think I am, =
but im sure atmospheric conditions effect the quality of communications wit=
h these guys. maybe they are preparing us all that a bridge will be easier =
to build on these dates..again dont shoot me on this because I could be so =
damn wrong.

just a thought

E




________________________________
From: "=
SnowfireL@..." <SnowfireL@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Fr=
iday, 14 August, 2009 14:10:38
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Training?

=A0 


___=
_____________________________

did you play your file back ?=A0 if you reco=
rded it I would bet there was all kinds of info on it, sometimes they start=
, at least for me, they started like more evp's=A0 then real time, now they=
 do both, and at times,=A0they are all chating at once it seems.=A0 I think=
 they are talking to each other, not just to us. sf

In a message dated 8/1=
4/2009 8:53:51 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, cozykat2003@ yahoo.com writes:
=
=A0 
>I have had a couple sessions now and still have not heard anything.=
=A0 I am wondering too if the spirits are still listening to me and letting=
 me get my "feet wet" before they will speak to me.=A0 I have been polite a=
nd have used both AM and FM bands.=A0 I tell them who I am, the day, time a=
nd location.=A0 I let them know my purpose for communicating and I ask for =
their help.=A0 I am being patient with the process.
>
>
>
>
_______________=
_________________
From: mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@netzero. com>
>To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups .com
>Sent: Friday, August 14, 2009 1:38:17 AM
>Subject: [EVP-I=
TC] Training?
>
>=A0 
>Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I can ask them =
to speak as one, because I think you hit the nail right on the head -- I do=
 hear them speaking over each other, half in male, half in female, so maybe=
 things would improve like you said if they organized into one collective v=
oice. Can they still answer questions about individuals this way, or are yo=
u limited to generalized queries?
>
>Regarding your statement: "Quite often=
 when a new speaker
>comes forth a bit of a training session can be heard f=
or how they can
>speak so that my physical self can hear what is said." So =
by this, do you mean it's possible it takes a couple of sessions for the en=
tity to master this new method of communication? For instance, I got my gra=
ndmother' s name (among others) during Tuesday's session, but she said noth=
ing, wouldn't answer our questions; Wednesday, she suddenly started talking=
 and was the primary person we communicated with, even correctly answered m=
y mother's questions about her childhood pets. Could this be because there'=
s a learning curve involved with talking through the radio? Does it take a =
session or two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is it all dependent on =
my skills?
>
>Oh, and wanted to say I'm going out tomorrow to buy all the c=
anned goods at the grocery store in anticipation of the nuclear winter we a=
re about to endure... Just kidding. Hearing about all that stuff they are p=
redicting, it does make me wonder, though, why they would go to such troubl=
e to tell you all that again and again -- what's to gain from it? It's not =
stirring anybody up. 
>
>

<P>Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I can ask them to speak as one, be=

l answer questions about individuals this way, or are you limited to genera=

 mother's=

ng curve involved with talking through the radio? Does it take a session or=
 two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is it all dependent on my skills?=
